void ldmx::SimParticleBuilder::buildSimParticles ( ldmx::Event *  outputEvent  ) 

Build SimParticle collection into an output event.

Parameters:
outputEvent The output event.

Definition at line 29 of file SimParticleBuilder.cxx.

References ldmx::Event::add(), buildParticleMap(), buildSimParticle(), and currentEvent_.

Referenced by ldmx::RootPersistencyManager::buildEvent().

00029                                                                      {
00030 
00031         // Clear the output particle collection.
00032         outputParticleColl_->Clear("C");
00033 
00034         // Get the trajectory container for the event.
00035         TrajectoryContainer* trajectories = (TrajectoryContainer*) (const_cast<G4Event*>(currentEvent_))->GetTrajectoryContainer();
00036 
00037         // Create empty SimParticle objects and create the map of track ID to particles.
00038         buildParticleMap(trajectories, outputParticleColl_);
00039 
00040         // Fill information into the particles.
00041         for (auto trajectory : *trajectories->GetVector()) {
00042             buildSimParticle(static_cast<Trajectory*>(trajectory));
00043         }
00044 
00045         // Add the collection data to the output event.
00046         outputEvent->add("SimParticles", outputParticleColl_);
00047     }
